What's wrong, Satera?\""},{"lineNumber":154944,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、なんでもない！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, it's nothing!"},{"lineNumber":154945,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とにかく死にたくなければ戦いに集中しろ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Anyway, if you don't want to die, focus on the battle!\""},{"lineNumber":154946,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……心の友、潮時だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Friend of my heart, it's time to quit.\""},{"lineNumber":154947,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なに？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What?\""},{"lineNumber":154948,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こりゃ敵わん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I can't beat this."},{"lineNumber":154949,"originalJapaneseLine":"　逃げた方が良さそうだぜと言っとるんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm saying it looks like it's better to run away.\""},{"lineNumber":154950,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いやだ、脱がす」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, I'm gonna strip her.\""},{"lineNumber":154951,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いやだって子供じゃないんだから！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No means no, I'm not a child anymore!\""},{"lineNumber":154952,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの魔導具の塊を引っぺがして","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll peel off that mass of magical tools,"},{"lineNumber":154953,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぜーーったいに中の美少女を見るんだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"and I'm absolutely going to see the beautiful girl inside!\""},{"lineNumber":154954,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んもー！　死んだら元も子もないでしょーに！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Geez! If you die, there's no hope left!\""},{"lineNumber":154955,"originalJapaneseLine":"「戯れ言ばかりを……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Just nonsense...\""},{"lineNumber":154956,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐうっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...\""},{"lineNumber":154957,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うう……ランス様ぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U-ugh... Lord Rance...\""},{"lineNumber":154958,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィの猛攻によりメンバーのほとんどが","translatedEnglishLine":"Because of Silky's fierce assault, most of the members"},{"lineNumber":154959,"originalJapaneseLine":"地に伏していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"were lying face down on the ground."},{"lineNumber":154960,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くそ、なんちゅう強さだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Damn, what strength...\""},{"lineNumber":154961,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、むしろ……弱いぞ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, actually... she's weak...\""},{"lineNumber":154962,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだと？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What did you say?\""},{"lineNumber":154963,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シルキィは20トンもする魔導具を使う魔人だ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Silky is a demon who uses magical tools weighing 20 tons..."},{"lineNumber":154964,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの甲冑は見たところせいぜい200キロ」","translatedEnglishLine":"That armor looks like it's at most 200 kilograms.\""},{"lineNumber":154965,"originalJapaneseLine":"「つまり……どういうことだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So... what does that mean?\""},{"lineNumber":154966,"originalJapaneseLine":"「多分……ケイブリスの命令か何かで、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Probably... by order of Cavebris or something,"},{"lineNumber":154967,"originalJapaneseLine":"　弱体化させられてる……」","translatedEnglishLine":"she's been weakened...\""},{"lineNumber":154968,"originalJapaneseLine":"「げ、これで弱体化してるのかよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, so this is her weakened state?\""},{"lineNumber":154969,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおっ、心の友避けろ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa! Friend of my heart, dodge!\""},{"lineNumber":154970,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh!\""},{"lineNumber":154971,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gah!?\""},{"lineNumber":154972,"originalJapaneseLine":"突進したシルキィがランスの首を掴んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"The charging Silky grabbed Rance's neck."},{"lineNumber":154973,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああああ！　ランス様ァ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aaaaah! Lord Rance!\""},{"lineNumber":154974,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なっ、引きずられていった！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What, he's being dragged away!\""},{"lineNumber":154975,"originalJapaneseLine":"掴んだ後もシルキィの突進は止まらず、","translatedEnglishLine":"Even after grabbing, Silky's charge did not stop,"},{"lineNumber":154976,"originalJapaneseLine":"そのままランスを引きずり続ける。","translatedEnglishLine":"and she kept dragging Rance along."},{"lineNumber":154977,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐおおおおおおおおお！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guaaaaaaaaaaaah!\""},{"lineNumber":154978,"originalJapaneseLine":"地面と体を擦られながら、気づけば","translatedEnglishLine":"As his body scraped against the ground, before he knew it,"},{"lineNumber":154979,"originalJapaneseLine":"そのまま数百メートル近くも移動していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"he had been dragged nearly several hundred meters."},{"lineNumber":154980,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うげっ、ごっ、がっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, guh, gah!?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類の希望は早めに消さなければと思っていた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've thought that humanity's hope must be extinguished quickly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何やってるんだ、こんな場所で
ケイブリス派の手伝いなんて！」
シルキィは何も答えない。
「どんな事情があるかは知らんが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't know what the circumstances are,
but I'll violate the female demon!"
What the hell is this guy?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リトルという魔導具の塊で守られてる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: protected by a mass of magical tools called Little."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リトル？　すごいのか、それは」
「世界に唯一のカオスは別格だけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The only Chaos in the world is in a class of its own, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスより少し劣る超級の魔導具が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Super-grade magical tools a little inferior to Chaos
have gathered into armor by the hundreds."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間なんかじゃ傷一つつけられないぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No human can leave a single scratch on it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とにかく死にたくなければ戦いに集中しろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyway, if you don't want to die, focus on the battle!"
"...Friend of my heart, it's time to quit."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げた方が良さそうだぜと言っとるんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm saying it looks like it's better to run away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやだって子供じゃないんだから！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No means no, I'm not a child anymore!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの魔導具の塊を引っぺがして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll peel off that mass of magical tools,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぜーーったいに中の美少女を見るんだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and I'm absolutely going to see the beautiful girl inside!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んもー！　死んだら元も子もないでしょーに！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Geez! If you die, there's no hope left!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィの猛攻によりメンバーのほとんどが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of Silky's fierce assault, most of the members
were lying face down on the ground.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「シルキィは20トンもする魔導具を使う魔人だ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Silky is a demon who uses magical tools weighing 20 tons...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの甲冑は見たところせいぜい200キロ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That armor looks like it's at most 200 kilograms."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「多分……ケイブリスの命令か何かで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Probably... by order of Cavebris or something,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「げ、これで弱体化してるのかよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, so this is her weakened state?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突進したシルキィがランスの首を掴んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The charging Silky grabbed Rance's neck.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 掴んだ後もシルキィの突進は止まらず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even after grabbing, Silky's charge did not stop,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのままランスを引きずり続ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and she kept dragging Rance along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地面と体を擦られながら、気づけば
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As his body scraped against the ground, before he knew it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのまま数百メートル近くも移動していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he had been dragged nearly several hundred meters.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
